title: Google\Cloud\DevTools\Source\V1\SourceContext
name: SourceContext
description:
A SourceContext is a reference to a tree of files. A SourceContext together with a path point to a unique revision of a single file or directory.

Generated from protobuf message google.devtools.source.v1.SourceContext

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.cloud_repo
params.description: A SourceContext referring to a revision in a cloud repo.

params.name: data.cloud_workspace
params.description: A SourceContext referring to a snapshot in a cloud workspace.

params.name: data.gerrit
params.description: A SourceContext referring to a Gerrit project.

params.name: data.git
params.description: A SourceContext referring to any third party Git repo (e.g. GitHub).
